short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask questions about the current site using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Site AI Assistant: Your Intelligent Web Companion

Explore websites with the power of AI at your fingertips. Site AI Assistant is a smart Chrome extension that helps you quickly understand and interact with any website you're visiting.

Key Features:
• Instant Website Analysis: Get immediate insights about the site you're on.
• Customizable Quick Actions: Tailor your most frequent queries for one-click access.
• Multi-Language Support: Communicate with the AI in your preferred language.
• Context-Aware Responses: Receive information specifically tailored to the current website.
• User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a sleek, intuitive design for seamless interaction.

Whether you're researching, shopping, or just curious about a website, Site AI Assistant is your go-to tool for quick, intelligent web navigation. Simply click the extension icon, ask your question, and get instant, relevant answers about the site you're exploring.

Powered by advanced AI technology, this assistant understands context, providing you with accurate and helpful information. Customize your experience with personalized quick actions and language preferences.

Enhance your browsing experience today with Site AI Assistant - your smart, always-ready web companion!

Note: This extension requires an OpenAI API key to function. API usage may incur costs as per OpenAI's pricing.
